General.Name: ORIENTBIO Inc.
General.Description: ORIENT BIO Inc. operates in the bio-industry in South Korea. The company produces laboratory animals. In addition, it offers various equipment for research environment. The company was formerly known as Orient Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ORIENT BIO Inc. in 2005. ORIENT BIO Inc. was founded in 1959 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.

0.Name: Mr. Jae-Jin  Chang
0.Title: Chairperson, Pres and Chief Exec. Officer
